page.title: 13HEALTH 2 - PULBOROUGH.
page.content: Patients are sent to King Edward 7th, Midhurst; Worthing Hospital or St. Richard's, Chichester.The midwife runs ante-natal classes & there is a mother & baby clinic. The surgery has its own dispensary & dangerous drugs are kept in a strong vault. Doctors have a half day off each week & 6 weeks holiday a year. They have a weekend duty rota. Pulborough's other surgery has three doctors who cover 300 sq. miles. The ambulance station has 4 ambulances fitted with modern cardiac equipment. This includes a life support machine to monitor heartbeat, & it can restart the heart with electric shocks. The Pulborough station was the first to obtain such equipment & the villagers raised the money.
